name: Gou'lash
description:
Controlls:

W S A D - movement

Left click - " melee" attack towards mouse position (it has quite a range so check your limits)

Right click - range attack towards mouse position

Space - dash towards mouse position (grants few invincibility frames)

Created for the United Game Jam with theme "Two". Boss is made of two creatures, a froglike one and blobby parasite. Duel is also two sides fighting against eachother. 

Old pal Gou'lash has been taken control of. There is no other way to help him than putting him to rest. Fight won't be easy so don't expect a first try success.

 Setting is basically alternative flooded world based on game I'm creating.

External assets: none - I've created everything

My prejam assets -  2 sprites: 

- 1st frame of main character

- orange tree sprite

Everything else was created specifically for this jam and this game.

This was my first jam. Hope you like the game!
